edu.umich.auth.cosign.pool
Class CosignSSLSocketFactory

java.lang.Object
  edu.umich.auth.cosign.pool.CosignSSLSocketFactory
public class CosignSSLSocketFactory
extends java.lang.Object

This singleton class creates SSL Sockets for Cosign connections. It reads the keystore and truststore path info from the CosignConfig class to create the SSlSocketFactory for all the future secure Cosign connections.

Author:
htchan
See Also:
CosignConfig

createSSLSocket

public javax.net.ssl.SSLSocket createSSLSocket(java.net.Socket s,
                                               java.lang.String hostname,
                                               int port,
                                               boolean autoClose)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
This method create SSL socket for Cosign connection.

Parameters:
s - Non-SSL socket to be converted
hostname - HostName of the Cosign Server
port - Port number of the Cosign Server
autoClose - close the underlying socket when this socket is closed
Returns:
SSL Socket for Cosign connection
Throws:
java.io.IOException
